Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "That's all for this week's routine report. Dismissed.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "Gray Raven Commandant? You're a bit worse for wear. Is your stomach okay?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I gotta bad feeling about today...', 3: '8'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Haha, you're just overthinking. The Gray Ravens are just performing routine equipment tests. What could possibly go wrong?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fingers crossed...', 3: '10'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Go back to your room and rest up. Just don't forget to meet at the mission dispatch area later.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{3: 'Returning to your room to rest, you find a Construct waiting inside, gracefully sipping a cup of tea.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Pine needle tea... Not as good as black tea, but it sure tastes like the wilderness.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu?! What are you doing here...', 3: '17'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'What\'s all the fuss about? All I did was use your "collar" as a springboard into Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'But your body...', 3: '19'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I'm just borrowing it for the time being. As I said before, only you can see the real me. Others just see me as some obsolete Construct.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'So... What are your plans for today?', 3: '21'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Aren't you a paranoid one... I don't have anything planned. I just want to learn more about Babylonia—learn more about your everyday life.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "You basically know all about my past, but I don't know anything about you. That's not exactly fair as your partner.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You have a point.', 3: '24'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Well, what about you?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm going to Mission Dispatch.", 3: '26'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I will go with you. It doesn't look like the Gray Ravens are around, so I don't think you have any reason to refuse.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Better than you running around and making a mess, I guess...', 3: '1500'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory52.jpg'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Is this where missions are dispatched...? What mission did you choose?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Patrolling a Low Viral Intensity Region... Isn't sending a star commandant such as yourself a bit overboard?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "What's there to hide? No matter how dangerous the task is, I won't be surprised... Let me see.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Low Viral Intensity Region guard duty...? That's it?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Male Commandant', 3: 'Hmph... Got that right. Our Big Boss is stealing missions from us average joes. Must have a hell of a grudge against us or something.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Female Commandant', 3: "Don't put it like that. Our Big Boss, being all high and mighty, shouldn't have to risk life and limb completing missions. They should just stay back and guard the rear.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Insensate buffoons... If you have time for envy, consider taking a good look at yourself!', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Male Commandant', 3: "Oh, I heard that Gray Ravens weren't here today... Are you one of our good Boss's temporary squad members? What can a walking pile of scrap metal like you do? Hahaha!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Commandant', 3: "No wonder you didn't choose a harder mission, Boss. Taking her with us would just be our death sentence!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cool it... We should get going.', 3: '50'}
{3: 'Seething with anger, Qu shuts her mouth and follows you, ignoring the arrogant laughter from the other commandants.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory31.jpg'}
{3: 'Soon, Qu and the commandants arrive at the location designated for the mission. To your surprise, you are joined by the previous two commandants.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Male Commandant', 3: "You actually came, Boss. I didn't think you'd seriously accept the mission after everything we said...", 4: '1'}
{2: "You'd think that, wouldn't you?", 3: '58'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Commandant', 3: "No matter, just don't slow us down.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'The same goes for you, too.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Male Commandant', 3: 'I am the leader of this operation. Everyone must obey my orders. Got it, Boss?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Commandant', 3: "Boss, you take the west. We'll stay here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Hmph, seems "reasonable"...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Roger. Let's go.", 3: '70'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Why do we have to listen to orders from dimwits? Is that how Babylonia works?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Orders must be obeyed on the battlefield.', 3: '72'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Still unable to understand, Qu follows you to take up garrison in the western region.'}
{3: "And very quickly, Qu's concerns come true..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory37.jpg'}
{2: 'Qu, are you hurt?!', 3: '81'}
{3: 'Qu tears out the Corrupted appendage stabbed into her leg. Vital fluid begins to pour out from her wound.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Don't worry. It's nothing serious... But we can't leave the cave now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Horrifying screams echo throughout the cave... You can tell that the Corrupted already have you surrounded.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "This can't just be a coincidence... The Corrupted already have us surrounded before we could establish a communication channel.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Obviously, Qu meant that the other two commandants set you up.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Boy, aren't you naive... Those in the limelight always attract those that want a share.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "You can't trust anyone on your way to the top... The Path to Glory is that of solitude.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't want to be at the top.", 3: '92'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Unfortunately, sometimes you don't have any other choice. Just like now.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Even if we have our differences, they're still our comrades.", 3: '94'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Enough with the comrade spiel... Even family members will stab you in the back!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I choose to trust them.', 3: '96'}
{3: 'You hand a signal flare to Qu.'}
{2: 'But do you trust me?', 3: '98'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "This is stupid... Even if there's only a 1% chance of success, I still won't lose hope...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu smiles. She picks up the flare and fires it into the sky—exposing your position to your comrades, but also the enemy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Rargh—!!! Argh!!'}
{3: 'As expected, you hear a flurry of footsteps as Corrupted approach the cave.'}
{3: "You sling Qu's hand over your shoulder to support her injured leg, then help her to her feet."}
{2: "They're coming, Qu!", 3: '106'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "I take back what I said earlier. Maybe you aren't a star commandant, you're just a fool. Simple as that.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You're only just now finding that out?", 3: '109'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "But I'm the star of Kowloong in my own right. I won't let my partner die so easily.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{3: 'Corrupted swarm the cave. Both of you manage to help each other fight through the waves of enemies, but you are nearing your limit.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "There's no stopping them...!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu kicks away an approaching Corrupted, causing her remaining leg to ignite with sparks as it is destroyed.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Commandant! It's okay, leave me! Run!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No need to retreat! Time to counterattack!', 3: '118'}
{3: 'Three flickering lights fly through the air, then fall around you and explode, turning most of the Corrupted into scrap iron.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Have they... really come to save us?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Male Commandant', 3: 'Hey, Boss! Are you guys okay?!', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm alright. Can't say the same about her legs.", 3: '125'}
{3: 'To your surprise, the two commandants from before arrive with the Support Force from Babylonia.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Commandant', 3: "Thank goodness! We wouldn't have found you had it not been for the signal flare.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Male Commandant', 3: 'Great work, Boss... That sure took a lot of courage to fire that off at a time like this.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The female commandant and support Construct begin work on repairing Qu's injured legs."}
{2: 'Female Commandant', 3: "You too. I didn't think an obsolete Construct could last so long against so many Corrupted...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Male Commandant', 3: 'I think we underestimated the combat capabilities of older models. I think we should take this to the Science Council for reevaluation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No... We just got lucky is all!', 3: '135'}
{3: "Qu couldn't help but laugh seeing you try to desperately explain yourself."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Maybe I underestimated "humans"—whether that be 【kuroname】 or the two other commandants.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Ugliness and beauty; malice and goodwill; cowardice and courage; vulnerability and strength—all are intertwined. Humanity is defined by contradiction and irrationality.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu looks off into the distance at the people celebrating the victory. Her gaze finally falls upon the person in the center of it all.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: '【kuroname】, I believe I now have a better understanding of what you believe in.', 4: '1'}
